blocks.content: A Task helps template designers in grouping subsequent actions that have a logical connection. Tasks are semi-active components as they do not directly collect data from users. They help organize the data collection strategy. They are elements that are collapsible, helping users navigating through their workflow. It is especially useful for use with reduced screen sizes.
